skills.name: Basic Attack
skills.desc: Normal attack using Close-Range weapons.

skills.name: Strength UP 1
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Master's Stance
skills.desc: Attacks hit the enemy's vitals. Increases Critical by 40. Decreases Lng-R by 10, and MP regeneration by 1.

skills.name: Sword Maniac
skills.desc: Close-Range fighting technique. Passive skill that increases Cls-R ATK. (Cls-R +3)

skills.name: Strength UP 2
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Strength UP 3
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Combo Attack
skills.desc: Normal attack using Close-Range weapons.

skills.name: Strength UP 4
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Armor Break
skills.desc:
Knock off your enemies' armor with heavy attacks, making your next attack stronger.
(Each hit has a chance to land a debuff. Debuff has a chance to decrease target's Blunt, Charge, and/or Slash resistance by 10%)

skills.name: Heavy Attack
skills.desc: A heavier attack than usual.

skills.name: Strength UP 5
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Strength. (Strength +3)

skills.name: Gatling Strike
skills.desc: Delivers a series of blows that make up for their individual weakness in number.

skills.name: Dragon Sweep
skills.desc: Sweeps like a dragon tail mowing down foes. Inflicts damage to all enemies in the vicinity based on weapons damage stats.

skills.name: Crescent Slash
skills.desc: Slashes enemies with crescent blades and inflicts all enemies in front of users Force-based damage.

skills.name: Tail of the Dragon
skills.desc: Whips enemy with the tail of the Dragon and inflicts all enemies in around the user with Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Shadowy Spiral Wave
skills.desc: Slashes at surrounding enemies feet, stopping their movement. Deals varying damage to all enemeies in area, depending on weapon.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Giant Swing
skills.desc: Using centrifugal force, perform two rotating attacks that damages any nearby enemies. Inflicts Weapon-based damage on enemies.

skills.name: Three Step Crescent Moon
skills.desc: Crescent energy is released 3 times in a row. Deals varying damage to enemies in front of the user, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Maelstrom
skills.desc: A smashing attack powerful enough to fell a group of trees with one blow. Inflicts weapon-based damage on all enemies in the area.

skills.name: Vulcan Hit
skills.desc: A hit that threatens to break their defense. Deals varying damage to one enemy, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Asura Charge
skills.desc: Charges like Asura and barrages an enemy with weapon-based damage in a rain of carnage.

skills.name: Heaven's Gate
skills.desc: Jumps and attacks from the air with fists and inflicts the enemy with damage based on the weapon.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Self-Explosion
skills.desc: Put your heart and soul into a big blow. Although user dies, all enemies in a straight line receive suicide based damage according to their HP.

skills.name: Max HP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max HP. (HP +30, HP Regen + 2)

skills.name: Tyrannical Jaw
skills.desc: Break your foe's defense, then deliver a blow from behind. Deals varying damage to one enemy, depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Blade of the King Beast
skills.desc: An attack of quite violent brutality, like a wild beast armed with a sword. Although weak in impact, blows can be delivered in rapid succession. Delivers weapon-based damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Large Cut
skills.desc: An attack that puts your entire body and soul into a single blow. Delivers weapon-based damage to a single enemy.

skills.name: Range Shot
skills.desc: Normal attack using projectile weapon.

skills.name: Speed UP 1
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: 13 Snipe
skills.desc: Sniping. Increases Critical by 40. Decreases CLS-R by 10, and MP regeneration by 1.

skills.name: Gun Maniac
skills.desc: Shooting skill learned through training. Passive skill that raises LNG-R ATK. (Long-Range +3)

skills.name: Speed UP 2
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Speed UP 3
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Long-Range Shot
skills.desc: Aim accurately, and hit a distant target.

skills.name: Speed UP 4
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)
Fire a shot that creates a vacuum behind it. All enemies between the user and the target are damaged. (Type Line AoE)

skills.name: Speed UP 5
skills.desc: Passive skill that increases Speed. (Speed +3)

skills.name: Heartbreaker
skills.desc: Aims for your enemy's vitals, momentarily lowering their long-range defense.

skills.name: Trigger Happy
skills.desc: Enables 3 rapid shots to the enemy. Deals damage based on weapon type.

skills.name: Magnificent 7
skills.desc: Firing faster than human sight. Can be fired 7 times in succession. Special attack that deals fixed damage.

skills.name: Eraser
skills.desc: Enables 6 rapid shots to the enemy through intense concentration. Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max MP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max MP. (MAX MP +15, MP Regen + 1)

skills.name: Viper Scope
skills.desc: Aims for the gaps in the enemy's armor, and increase the damage of follow-up projectile, pierce, and shot attacks. Weapon-based damage.

skills.name: Max MP UP
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Max MP. (MAX MP +15, MP Regen + 1)

skills.name: Bullet-ridden Pit
skills.desc: Fills your enemy with holes through random fire. Varying damage to one enemy. Shot range is short.

skills.name: Heavy Sonic Trigger
skills.desc: After every shot, a countdown to the gallows. High knockback.

skills.name: Qi Shot
skills.desc: Gather bio-energy and fire a shot without bullets. Deals varying damage to one enemy depending on weapon type.

skills.name: Blast Trigger
skills.desc: Enables 7 chain attacks on a target. Deals a good amount of weapon-based damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Basic Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in a defensive stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Slows enemies' attack recovery.

skills.name: Vitality UP 1
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Smite Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in an Anti-Demon stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Slows enemies' attack recovery even longer.

skills.name: Stun Guard
skills.desc: The user stands in a defensive stance, decreasing Attack and Spin damage, and inflicts a Stun effect.

skills.name: Exceed Guard
skills.desc: A switch skill which can switch between on and off. The most powerful guard available. Activating which accuracy will reduce incanation time, however the critical attack will decrease. (Incantation -50%, Critical -20)

skills.name: Vitality UP 2
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Power Guard
skills.desc: The user guards, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Force enemies back with all your might.

skills.name: Vitality UP 3
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Whither Guard
skills.desc: The user guards, decreasing Attack and Spin damage. Damage of follow-up close-range skills are raised.

skills.name: Vitality UP 4
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Resolution Guard
skills.desc: The Player gets into a Guard stance, but is unable to reduce Attack and Spin damage. However, the Player becomes able to blow the opponent away through sheer willpower.

skills.name: Vitality UP 5
skills.desc: A Passive skill that increases Vitality. (Vitality +3)

skills.name: Speed Block
skills.desc: The Player immediately gets into a Guard stance that can reduce Attack and Spin damage. The opponent will recover easily, but with lowered defense.

skills.name: Tetra Counter
skills.desc: he user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage.

skills.name: Sword Slap
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with no effect on Friendship level.

skills.name: Poison Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage and Poison effect.

skills.name: Bind Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage and Bind effect.

skills.name: Counter Zwei
skills.desc: A switch skill which can switch between on and off. The most powerful counter available. Activating with accuracy will reduce incantation time, however the user's critical attack will also decrease. (Incantation -50%, Critical -20)

skills.name: Vampire Counter
skills.desc: User goes into a Counter stance, counters Attack and Rush. Deals damage to both the enemy's HP and MP. (Absorbs 1/2th of damage as MP. If MP damage is less than 2, you will only absorb 1 MP.)

skills.name: In-Fight Counter
skills.desc: The user prepares a Counter, and responds to Attack and Rush with Counter damage, but the enemy is not knocked back. Follow-up attacks are possible.

skills.name: Strikeback (Bash)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can deliver tremendous damage when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Strikeback (Soul)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can severely deplete the opponent's MP when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies.

skills.name: Strikeback (World)
skills.desc: The user gets into a Counter stance that can deliver tremendous damage when countering an Attack or Rush move. Damages surrounding enemies. (Larger range than Strikeback (Bash))

skills.name: Basic Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage.

skills.name: Luck UP 1
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Pyro Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a fire-based effect.

skills.name: Stun Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a Stun effect.

skills.name: Luck UP 2
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Dodge Drain
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage. Steals MP from enemies.

skills.name: Luck UP 3
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Petra Dodge
skills.desc: The user gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and hits enemies with a Stone effect.

skills.name: Luck UP 4
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Dodge (Shot Failure)
skills.desc: The Player gets into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage while reducing Long-Range and Spell damage inflicted by the opponent.

skills.name: Dodge (Grace of Feather)
skills.desc: The Player becomes light as a feather and can swiftly get into Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage, and reduces the elemental resistances of the opponent.

skills.name: Luck UP 5
skills.desc: Passive Skill that increases Luck. (Luck +3)

skills.name: Ultrasonic Dodge
skills.desc: The Player becomes unbelievably nimble and can almost immediately get into a Dodge stance that nulls Shot and Rapid damage.
